item.title: Episode 54
item.description: " height="102px" width="400px" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" The Creative Stoic Podcast iTunes _/ Spotify /_ Google Podcasts _/Anchor & More #54 -The Philosophy Behind Time Tacking " height="102px" width="400px" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" Time tracking is one of those things that can drastically improve our productivity level. Yet, not enough of us do it. In this episode I talk about the advantages of time tracking and why you should do it.
